comments.raw_text: According to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=625247#c8, putting a class that has an nsAutoTArray member into an nsAutoTArray will cause bad things to happen.  We should prevent this, either statically if possible or through a runtime abort if necessary.
comments.author: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.creator: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.text: According to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=625247#c8, putting a class that has an nsAutoTArray member into an nsAutoTArray will cause bad things to happen.  We should prevent this, either statically if possible or through a runtime abort if necessary.

comments.raw_text: Putting an nsAutoTArray into a nsTArray of any sort will cause problems.  You also can't put nsAutoTArrays in pldhashtables.
comments.creator: justin.lebar+bug@gmail.com
comments.author: justin.lebar+bug@gmail.com
comments.text: Putting an nsAutoTArray into a nsTArray of any sort will cause problems.  You also can't put nsAutoTArrays in pldhashtables.
...that is, unless we make nsAutoTArray memmoveable in bug 682735.
comments.raw_text: ...that is, unless we make nsAutoTArray memmoveable in bug 682735.
comments.creator: justin.lebar+bug@gmail.com
comments.author: justin.lebar+bug@gmail.com

comments.text: Right, this bug was about preventing you from doing that, either statically or through a runtime abort, so that if you did you'd see a clear error instead of random crashes.
comments.author: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.creator: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.raw_text: Right, this bug was about preventing you from doing that, either statically or through a runtime abort, so that if you did you'd see a clear error instead of random crashes.
